attributes.action: Allow horse riding schools to stay open with covid safe rules
attributes.additional_details: Allow horse riding lessons to go ahead with covid safe rules
attributes.background: Allow horse riding lessons and schools to stay open with covid safe rules to help out with younger students that feel isolated and to help others that have mental health issues

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557277
